name: Sa(n)tan
description:
Santa has been possessed by a demon seeking to destroy Christmas (and you). To defeat him, you must remind him what Christmas is by finding the ultimate present.

Use the WASD keys to move, mouse to aim and left click to use your Christmas spirit.

The objective of the game is to find the ultimate present by heading towards the direction of the sound of the bell while avoiding Santa whose presence would be announced by the Jingle bells song

This game was made during the duration of the 32bit holiday game jam 2021.
